item.title:
Joachim Trier is set to reunite with ‘The Worst Person In The World’ co-writer Eskil Vogt for his next film.
Described as “an ambitious yet playful family drama set in Oslo.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Theo James to star in adaption of Stephen King’s ‘THE MONKEY’ with James Wan set to produce.
It follows twin brothers as they find their father’s old monkey toy in the attic but then gruesome deaths starts begin to occur all around them.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: “I believe in the magic of Disney. I’m able to still appreciate that and not let the callousness of that interaction sully my relationship and history with them, because they’re two separate things.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Scarlett Johansson says she still “believes in the magic of Disney” despite her legal battle with them.
“I think it’s because I could separate the creatives at Disney from the business affairs department. I had great working relationships with creatives there and continue to.”
item.author: FilmUpdates
